ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: The Tablet of Destinies
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the aftermath of Winifred's abduction, Lady Mechanika's only recourse lies in unraveling the mystery of the fabled Tablet of Destinies. The only clues, however, are a cryptic message and rumors of a notorious secret society - an elite fraternity steeped in mysticism and reputedly impossible to find without an invitation. Will Lady Mechanika succeed in infiltrating their elusive ranks in time to save her young friend?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel & Mike Garcia | 1 | B | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 5 | C | Retailer Incentive | Joe Benitez & Martin Montiel | 4 | D | Online Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 3 | E | BlueRainbow Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Peter Steigerwald | Missing | F | Jesse James Comics Exclusive (Limited to 250 copies) | Mike DeBalfo & Ula Mos | Missing | F/BW | Jesse James Comics Exclusive Black/White Sketch Edition (Limited to 100 copies) | Mike DeBalfo | Missing | G | Jesse James Comics Exclusive (Limited to 250 copies) | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | Missing | G/BW | Jesse James Comics Exclusive Black/White Sketch Edition (Limited to 100 copies) | Jamie Tyndall | Missing | W | White Edition | Joe Benitez | 2 | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
